name: The Gut Brain
the-point: Your gut has its own nervous system with 100 million neurons; it's often called the 'second brain'.

name: Bone Strength
the-point: Gram for gram, human bone is stronger than steel.

name: Skin Shedding
the-point: The average human sheds about 40 pounds of skin in their lifetime.

name: Brain Power
the-point: Your brain generates enough electricity to power a small lightbulb.

name: Taste Buds
the-point: You have taste buds in your stomach, lungs, and brainâ€”not just your tongue.

name: Sleep Deprivation
the-point: You can survive longer without food than you can without sleep.

name: Liver Regeneration
the-point: The liver is the only organ that can fully grow back from just 25% of its original tissue.

name: Morning Height
the-point: You are about 1cm taller in the morning than you are at night.

name: Bacteria Balance
the-point: There are more bacterial cells in your body than there are human cells.

name: Heart Rhythm
the-point: When a couple in love gazes into each other's eyes, their heart rates can synchronize.

name: Dream Duration
the-point: Most dreams only last between 5 and 20 minutes, even if they feel like hours.

name: The Appendix
the-point: The appendix isn't useless; it acts as a 'safe house' for good bacteria.

name: Blood Vessel Length
the-point: If you laid out all a human's blood vessels in a line, they would wrap around Earth twice.

name: Muscle Memory
the-point: Muscles don't 'remember'; the brain just becomes more efficient at sending signals to those specific fibers.

name: Eye Resolution
the-point: The human eye has a resolution equivalent to about 576 megapixels.

name: Sneezing Speed
the-point: A sneeze can travel out of your nose at 100 miles per hour.

name: Nerve Impulse
the-point: Nerve impulses to and from the brain travel as fast as 170 miles per hour.

name: Tongue Print
the-point: Just like fingerprints, everyone has a completely unique tongue print.

name: Longevity Genes
the-point: Is it possible to 'turn off' aging, or is death a hard-coded limit in our DNA?

name: Placebo Effect
the-point: Even when people know they are taking a sugar pill, the placebo effect can still work.

name: Heat Production
the-point: In 30 minutes, the human body gives off enough heat to bring a gallon of water to a boil.

name: Phobias
the-point: Are we born with phobias (like snakes/heights) or are they entirely learned behaviors?

name: Brain Storage
the-point: The human brain has a storage capacity of roughly 2.5 petabytes (one million gigabytes).

name: Blinking
the-point: The average person blinks 15-20 times per minute, totaling about 1,200 times an hour.

name: Iron Content
the-point: Your body has enough iron in it to make a small metal nail.
